statements: DELETE FROM shipping_notifications WHERE order_id = 1001 AND status = 'delivered';
DELETE FROM shipping_notifications WHERE order_id = 100 AND notification_type = 'shipping_update';
DELETE FROM update_triggers WHERE trigger_event = 'order_cancelled' AND trigger_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM shipping_updates WHERE update_type = 'delayed' AND update_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ShippingOrders WHERE order_id = 1001 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM ShippingNotifications WHERE order_id = 2002 AND notification_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM notification_subscriptions WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND recipient_email = 'example@example.com';
DELETE FROM notification_subscriptions WHERE shipment_id = 100 AND notification_type = 'delayed';
